channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Celtics star Jrue Holiday sells his Boston mansion for $6.69 million
item.description: Months after he was traded to the Portland Trail Blazers, Holiday has finalized the sale of his Boston home.

item.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
item.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

item.title: ‘Today’ host Jason Kennedy sells his renovated Agoura Hills home for $3.9 million in 45 days
item.description: Jason Kennedy, of NBC’s “Today” show, has found a buyer for his sprawling property in the Santa Monica Mountains in Los Angeles County.

item.title: Why 2026 could be a banner year for regional-bank stocks
item.description: A steepening yield curve, a looser regulatory environment and increasing M&A activity all bode well, according to Catherine Mealor of KBW.
